Name: Orcs
Attack: Move 1. Deal 2 Melee damage
Retaliate: Deal 1 damage. Remove a Player Buff.
Special: EASILY AMBUSHED | When revealed via :scout:, they take 1 damage.

Name: Goblin Sappers
Attack: Move 1. Deal 2 Damage to Workers, ignoring Shield
Special: PUT â€˜EM TO WORK | Overkill bonus: :mine: :mine:

Name: Skeleton Archers
Attack: Players take 2 Ranged damage and one player takes Burning.
Retaliate: Any player at range takes 1 damage.
Special: FIRE RESISTANT | Reduce damage from Fire attacks by 2.

Name: Adepts
Attack: Player with the active spell that has the most Max Stacks takes 2 Damage to Mages
Special: MAGIC RESISTANT | The maximum number of stacks a spell can cast on Adepts is 2.

Name: Commander
Attack: Move 1. Deal Melee damage equal to Worker income (max: 3).
Retaliate: Deal 1 damage to the player with the lowest health
Special: DEFECTORS | Overkill bonus: gain 2 Workers

Name: Forgefiends
Attack: Add Broken Shield to the enemy with the least health and does not already have a Shield.
Special: BACKSTOCK | Overkill bonus: gain Shield

Name: Wargs
Attack: Move 1. Players collectively take 4 damage to Workers
Retaliate: Melee: Deal 1 damage to Worker (melee attacker only)
Special: VULNERABLE TO RANGED | No retaliation for attacks at Range.

Name: Falconers
Attack: Players take 2 Ranged Damage to Workers
Special: AIR RESISTANT | Reduce damage from Air attacks by 2.

Name: Marauders
Attack: Steal 1 Resource at Melee. Deal damage equal to total Resources stolen.
Special: RECLAIM LOOT | Gain 1 stolen Resource for each HP of overkill.

Name: Flamewisps
Attack: Choose a player with Burning, and deal 3 damage to them. Otherwise, apply Burning to two adjacent players.
Special: VULNERABLE TO WATER | No retaliation with Water damage

Name: Bandits
Attack: Deal 1 Melee. Steal 1 Resource. Move 1. Deal 1 Melee. Steal 1 Resource.
Special: RECLAIM LOOT | Gain 1 stolen Resource for each HP of overkill.

Name: Goblins
Attack: At Melee, deal 2 damage to Mages and apply Burning.
Special: EASILY AMBUSHED | When revealed via :scout:, they take 1 damage.

Name: Ogres
Attack: Move 1. Deal 3 Melee damage to a single Worker job.
Special: EASILY AMBUSHED | When revealed via :scout:, they take 1 damage.

Name: Pyromancers
Attack: Apply Burning to two adjacent players.  Deal 2 damage to each of those players.
Retaliate: If player has any Fire, deal 2 Damage and apply Burning. Otherwise, deal 1 damage
Special: VULNERABLE TO WATER | No retaliation with Water damage

Name: Armored Hobgoblins
Attack: If this enemy has a Shield, deal 4 Melee damage. Otherwise, deal 1 Melee damage and gain Broken Shield
Special: SHIELD-OBSESSED | After revealed, gain a shield token if they do not already have one.

Name: Dark Mage
Attack: Dark Mage heals all damage. Move this card to the bottom of the division.
Special: FIGUREHEAD | When defeated, you win!

Name: Orc Rangers
Attack: Deal 3 Ranged damage to a single player and apply Burning.
Special: QUICK COUNTER | Retaliates when Revealed without an attack

Name: Berserkers
Attack: If Berserkers have 3 health or more, they take 2 Damage. Then, players collectively take damage equal to the number of hitpoints Berserkers have below their max HP.
Retaliate: If, after attack, Berserkers have 3 health or more, they take 2 Damage.
Special: EASILY AMBUSHED | When revealed via :scout:, they take 1 damage.

Name: Siege Machines
Attack: Two players each take 2 damage, ignoring Shield.
Special: SHIELD BYPASS | When dealing damage, do not apply or break Shields

Name: Abomination
Attack: Deal 3 Damage and apply Hungry to the player with the fewest Resources
Special: TERRIFYING AMBUSH | If this enemy is revealed via Enemy attack, it gains Strength

Name: Dust Sharks
Attack: Move 1. Deal 2 damage. Move 1. Deal 2 damage.
Special: CONSTANT MOVEMENT. Takes +1 damage from Rooted.

Name: Witch
Attack: Deal 3 Ranged damage to a single Mage job
Retaliate: Deal 2 damage to a single Mage job
Special: VULNERABLE TO AIR | No retaliation to Air damage.

Name: Chaos Demon
Attack: Choose a random Stolen resource. Destroy all of those resources at Melee range.
Special: MASSIVE LOOT | Gain 2 stolen Resources for each HP of overkill

Name: Elemental
Attack: Randomly choose a Stolen Resource and deal damage 3 damage to the player with the most of that resource
Retaliate: Steal 1 random resource from the attacker
